Text: Utopia (Björk album):  During a Facebook Live event held on 15 September 2017, the release date of the album's first single, Björk gave insight into the album's theme of utopia in an uncertain political environment: "We have Trump, we have Brexit, we have our issues in Iceland, we have our environmental issues.
